Gentlemen-
	I spoke with Alan H. today and he has finally been down in 
the basement and has checked his stock. Unfortunately he has only TEN 
copies of number two. The first ten gentlemen who responded to me 
will each get a set of 2-4,6-9. You know who you are.
	I can get 3,4,6-9 for $100 plus shipping if you didn't get 
the above message privately,but are still interested in these books, 
Please contact me OFF LIST,
Tom
